headline: Bristol Myers Squibb (BMY) Surpasses Market Returns: Some Facts Worth Knowing
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Bristol Myers Squibb (BMY) stood at $47.66, denoting a +1.32% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Recent Agreements Set To Bolster BioNTech SE (BNTX)’s Oncology Arm
summary: BioNTech SE (NASDAQ:BNTX) is one of the 13 Best German Stocks to Invest in Now. It is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on immunotherapies to treat cancer and other serious diseases. headline: Will Recent Label Expansions of Opdivo Help BMY Gain Momentum?
summary: BMY leans on Opdivo's solid growth and new approvals as generics pressure its other top drugs and shares remain under pressure.
